description:
Molly is a hardened fork of Signal on Android with some extra usability and security features. This video review unpacks what features Molly adds, what my experience using it has been, pros/cons, and a lot more! Definitely a neat open source project!

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook! Visit their site to learn more about keeping your data safe with E2EE notes: https://notesnook.com

title: Molly: A More Secure Signal
